exercises.name: Running
exercises.description: A high-intensity activity that improves cardiovascular endurance by running at a steady pace.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: A full-body exercise involving jumping with arms and legs spread out.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that combines squats, push-ups, and jumps to boost cardio fitness.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: An exercise that engages the core and mimics a climbing motion.

exercises.name: Rowing
exercises.description: A cardio workout that simulates rowing, engaging multiple muscle groups.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the lower body muscles by lowering the hips from a standing position.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps by pushing the body up from the floor.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: A weightlifting movement focusing on the lower back and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A strength exercise that targets the chest by pressing a barbell upward.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that strengthens the legs and improves balance.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch focusing on lengthening the muscles of the back of the thigh.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: A yoga movement that improves spinal flexibility by alternating between arching and rounding the back.

exercises.name: Quad Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch that targets the quadriceps by pulling the foot toward the glutes.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs.

exercises.name: Triceps Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch that lengthens the triceps and improves shoulder mobility.

exercises.name: Cycling
exercises.description: A low-impact exercise that improves cardiovascular endurance by pedaling a bicycle.

exercises.name: Swimming
exercises.description: A full-body workout that increases stamina by moving through water.

exercises.name: Rowing
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that builds endurance by simulating rowing.

exercises.name: Long-Distance Running
exercises.description: Running over extended distances to build endurance.

exercises.name: Hiking
exercises.description: Walking long distances on trails to build endurance and strength.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Stand
exercises.description: A balance exercise that involves standing on one leg to improve stability.

exercises.name: Tree Pose
exercises.description: A yoga pose where one foot is placed on the inner thigh of the opposite leg to improve balance.

exercises.name: Bosu Ball Squats
exercises.description: Squats performed on an unstable surface to challenge balance.

exercises.name: Tightrope Walk
exercises.description: Walking heel-to-toe on a line to improve coordination and balance.

exercises.name: Heel Raises
exercises.description: A simple exercise that improves ankle stability and balance.

exercises.name: Sprints
exercises.description: Short bursts of running at maximum speed to improve overall velocity.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: A cardio exercise where you rapidly raise your knees to chest level, improving agility and speed.

exercises.name: Suicides
exercises.description: A drill where you run to different points and back to improve speed.

exercises.name: Cone Drills
exercises.description: Speed drills involving running between cones in different patterns.

exercises.name: Bounding
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise that emphasizes speed and power in running.

exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.description: A movement that increases mobility in the hips by rotating them in a circular motion.

exercises.name: Arm Swings
exercises.description: A dynamic warm-up exercise to increase shoulder and arm mobility.

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.description: A full-body stretch that improves mobility in multiple areas.

exercises.name: Ankle Rolls
exercises.description: A mobility exercise that improves ankle flexibility and reduces stiffness.

exercises.name: Spinal Twists
exercises.description: A stretch that enhances mobility in the spine.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: An exercise that improves coordination by jumping over a rotating rope.

exercises.name: Ladder Drills
exercises.description: A speed and coordination drill involving quick foot movements through a ladder pattern on the ground.

exercises.name: Juggling
exercises.description: A skill-based activity that challenges hand-eye coordination.

exercises.name: Ball Toss Drills
exercises.description: Exercises where you toss and catch a ball with a partner to improve coordination.

exercises.name: Balance Beam Walk
exercises.description: Walking on a narrow surface to improve coordination and balance.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: An explosive movement where you jump onto a box, improving lower body power.

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
exercises.description: A dynamic exercise where you slam a weighted ball to the ground, building upper body power.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: An explosive exercise that builds power in the hips and lower back.

exercises.name: Power Cleans
exercises.description: A weightlifting move that builds full-body power.

exercises.name: Broad Jumps
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise that enhances leg power by jumping forward.

exercises.name: Planks
exercises.description: An isometric core exercise that enhances stability by holding a push-up position.

exercises.name: Side Planks
exercises.description: A variation of the plank that focuses on strengthening the obliques and improving lateral stability.

exercises.name: Bird Dogs
exercises.description: A core exercise that promotes stability by extending one arm and the opposite leg.

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.description: An anti-rotation exercise that enhances core stability.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: An exercise that strengthens the glutes and promotes hip stability.
